title: Cape Physics
description: Adds dynamic physics to player capes for enhanced realism.

title: Armor HUD
description: Displays your equipped armor on the HUD.

title: Bow Indicator
description: Shows the charge level of your bow for accurate shots.

title: Chat
description: Enhances the in-game chat experience with various features.

title: Chunk Border
description: Displays the chunk when holding a nautilus shell in offhand while in 3rd person.

title: Coordinates
description: Displays your current X, Y, Z coordinates on screen with other useful information.

title: Crosshair Changer
description: Allows you to customize the appearance of your crosshair.

title: Day Event
description: Displays in-game day events on the HUD.

title: Day Counter
description: Keeps track of the number of days passed in your Minecraft world.

title: Direction HUD
description: Displays your current facing direction (North, South, East, West).

title: Exp Calculator
description: Calculates experience needed for the next level.

title: ForceCoords
description: Forces coordinates display even when normally hidden.

title: Hitbox
description: Displays a hitbox on the player.

title: Hit Color
description: Changes the color of the player when getting hit.

title: Hotbar
description: Customizable hotbar display with additional information.

title: HUD Popup
description: Displays bug report pop-up message on your HUD.

title: InventoryHUD
description: An enhanced inventory display directly on your screen.

title: Item Counter
description: Counts Arrows, Potions and Totems items in your inventory or hotbar.

title: Low Durability
description: Alerts you when your equipped items have low durability.

title: Main Hand HUD
description: Shows the item held in your main hand with it's durability.

title: Offhand HUD
description: Shows the item held in your offhand.

title: Playerlist
description: Displays a list of players currently in your world or server.

title: Saturation Display Changer
description: Adds a saturated overlay on your screen.

title: Server Display
description: Shows information about the server you are currently on.

title: Slot Counter
description: Counts the number of occupied and empty slots in your inventory.

title: Speedometer
description: Displays your current movement speed in blocks per second.

title: Status HUD
description: Displays various player status.

title: Target HUD
description: Shows information about the player you are currently targeting.

title: Timer HUD
description: A timer display to keep track of your session time.

title: Walk Distance
description: Displays the total distance you have walked in the game.

title: Waypoints+
description: Waypoints, death points, green screen visual.
